sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import Breadcrumb from '../common/breadcrumb'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardHeader, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import Rating from 'react-rating' import {StarRating,HeartRating,ThumbsUpDownRating,PillRating} from '../../constant' const RatingComponent = () => { const [rating, setRating] = useState(5) const [heart, setHeart] = useState(0) const [thumbs, setThumbs] = useState(0) return (
{StarRating}
 setRating(rate)} >
{"You Rated :"} {rating}
{HeartRating}
 setHeart(rate)} >
{"You Rated :"} {heart}
{ThumbsUpDownRating}
 setThumbs(rate)} >
{"You Rated :"} {thumbs}
{PillRating}
 ---} fullSymbol={['A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'E'].map(n => {n})} onClick={(rate) => alert(rate)} > ); }; export default RatingComponent;
